title: How to become a song ghostwriter - Quora

response.answer_text: I am very ignorant about the music industry, because of that I can only give you a limited answer. I know that it is possible for some people to get paid to write songs. I don’t even know whether or not song writing is something that gets ‘ghostwritten’ but I am aware that sometimes a musician or band does a song and then people find out that “a songwriter wrote that one” rather than the members of that band. I think it might be possible to ghostwrite a song at websites such as http://Guru.com where the work is real. The pay is often painfully low, but the work is usually real and legitimate, although there are some fakes there at times. Here is a link that gets you going in the right direction: 5 Tips for Songwriting Success in Today’s Music Industry Due to my own ignorance, I can’t help you better than that.
